==German== ===Etymology=== {{suffix|de|Wunder|bar}}. Akin to Dutch [[wonderbaar]], Swedish [[underbar]] and Low German [[wunnerbor]]. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈvʊndɐˌbaːɐ̯/}} * {{audio|de|De-wunderbar.ogg|audio}} ===Adjective=== {{de-adj|er|sten}} # [[wonderful]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj|wunderbar|wunderbarer|wunderbarst}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|wunderbarlich}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
